mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM local_phone a JOIN country c ON a.country = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO local_phone( id, country, name, phone, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{country.id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE local_phone SET name = #{name}, country = #{country.id}, phone = #{phone}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
